name: Zoom
0:
”Alexa, ask Zoom to show my upcoming meeting”
”Alexa, ask Zoom to Start a meeting”
”Alexa, ask Zoom to Join the meeting”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: zoom
des:
This Zoom skill is a great companion to the Zoom app, to help you work faster and more efficiently. By using Alexa voice commands on your mobile device, you can easily start a meeting, join an upcoming meeting, or check your meeting schedule on Zoom.

For a completely hands-free experience, you can say things like:
"Alexa, ask Zoom to show my upcoming meeting"
"Alexa, ask Zoom to Start a meeting"
"Alexa, ask Zoom to Join the meeting"
 
Note: This skill is meant to be used on your phone. Try it with a pair of Echo Buds, Echo Frames, or an Alexa hands-free phone!
